attributes.action: Stop the sale of Legal Highs on our high streets.
attributes.additional_details:
Many people are rushed to hospital every day as they have been poisoned and had disturbing side affects and to the point Legal Highs are more lethal than Class A drug Heroin. Many people die from Legal Highs every year when taken at parties and raves and festivals. This needs to stop and stop for good.

Please sign this petition to raise more awareness on Legal Highs.
attributes.background: Our community, would like the goverment to take action on so called legal highs,legal highs are a growing concern in Britain ,our children are becoming addictive there is no help out there and families are been torn apart. We need more awareness on the dangers of these drugs. Ban Legal Highs
